text: Has anyone figured out - or is there documentation on - how to play around with the experimental components?

Sometimes there are protected pages shared by HubSpot Devs but they usually appear after the existing experimental phase. Your best bet is going through the source code as it's quite well structured and should provide all the info needed
By experimental components, do you mean those we publish on `/experimental` path? We don't document those as they are not supposed to be an official release, and not to be used in production.
